experiences.summary: Delivered full-stack features using TypeScript (backend) and React + shadcn/ui (frontend), improving UI consistency and data reliability.
achievements: Built and maintained backend services integrating AWS DynamoDB, CloudWatch, SES, ensuring stability and accurate data flow.
Refactored legacy code and optimized shared components, improving performance through clearer logic and caching.
Implemented UX enhancements: filtering, sorting, navigation fixes, and policy/email logic updates.
Resolved workflow requests, data corrections, and content updates across teams.
Improved cross-team collaboration by increasing visibility into tasks and communication pipelines.

experiences.summary: Designed and developed the platform using React, Node.js, and MongoDB, focused on real-time crypto heatmaps and social volume analytics.
achievements: Integrated REST + WebSocket APIs for live market insights and creator trend tracking.
Built advanced visualizations using D3.js and Chart.js for dynamic, interactive market data.
Improved performance and scalability using Docker, AWS (S3, EC2), and Cloudflare for high-volume crypto data pipelines.

experiences.summary: Developed healthcare management dashboards (patients, labs, pharmacy, equipment) using Flask, Docker, Kubernetes.
achievements: Implemented secure authentication: login/registration, persistent cookies, HTTPS via Nginx, and multi-level user roles.
Added features including patient feedback, AI diagnostics, medication reminders, telemedicine tools, and a healthcare chatbot.
